projects.title: Property Price Forecast
projects.description: Handpicked a diverse dataset to predict house prices using cloud technologies. Leveraged extensive programming knowledge and technical skills in data preprocessing to achieve an accuracy of 87. Demonstrated strong problemsolving abilities by implementing machine learning algorithms Linear Regression, Random Forest. Deployed the model using Docker for seamless integration with cloud platforms. Implemented advanced EDA techniques on a curated dataset to predict house prices. Utilized cloud technologies and programming knowledge proficiently in data preprocessing. Achieved an accuracy of 87 through robust problemsolving by applying machine learning algorithms Linear Regression, Random Forest. Deployed the model using Docker for optimal performance.

projects.title: Wireless Sensor Networks with Fuzzy Ant Colony Optimization

Leveraged Graph Neural Networks GNNs to design a scalable solution for efficient data routing, showcasing robust technical skills and soft skills.
